mdRecord.dcterms:title: We conquer, or die! / composed by James Pierpont
The war drum is beating, prepare for the fight
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Pierpont, James, 1822-1893
mdRecord.dcterms:description: "Entered according to Act of Congress in the year 1861 by P.P. Werlein & Halsey in the Ct. Off. of the D.C. of the C.S. for the D. of La."--P. 3.
Probable date of publication inferred from form of publisher's name. John C. Schreiner & Son operated in Macon between 1862 and 1864. Cf. Handbook of early American sheet music / Dichter and Shapiro.
Verses 4-6 printed as text on p. 5.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: M1 .S445 v.5 no.26: Twenty-sixth title in a bound volume of sheet music from the library of Mrs. Harriet Irvine.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Southern musical bouquet of favorite songs and ballads ; no. 3
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Songs with piano
